title: Bragging rights: What's the rarest item in your League of Legends collection?
body:
After recently getting back into the game (oops) I realised I have a lot of pretty cool old rare stuff in my in game collection that a lot of newer players wouldn't even recognise.

The top 5 in my collection + reasoning would have to be:

1. Worlds 2012 - Championship Riven Icon
2. Shurima 2014 - Perfect Ascension Icon
3. Season 3 Victorious Ward Skin
4. Snowdown 2012 - Tower Icon 
5. Snow Day Ziggs 

Probably not difficult to beat.. That being said: SHOW ME WHAT U GOT!!

replies.body:
Riot singed {{champion:27}} 

From when he was released - not a hextech :D

Well I don't think it's that rare, but apparently they are:

1) Medieval Twitch (Banned account)
2) Annie in Wonderland (Banned account)
3) Fnatic Icon - 2012 (Banned account)
4) Gambit Icon - 2012
5) Tribal Ryze (?) - Crafted

I know a guy who has Rusty Blitzcrank, but that's as 'rare' as it gets.

I'd be super annoyed if my account got ban with that on it haha
Twitch and Annie skins are pretty cool, any chance you can get unban?
And I have a friend who has Judgement Kayle which is up there with the rarer skins. 
Rusty Blitz is hilarious, an everlasting reminder of Rito's infamous costuming disaster lol

It's a permanent ban.

So no.

I have other accounts, but this one had over 600 worth of skins and icons.

My top 5 i think are somewhat rare:

1) Harrowing- Spirit of the Altar (obtained when you bought a harrowing skin or ward) -2013
2) Neo Pax Sivir - 2017
3) Team builder marksmen icon -2014
4) League client update alpha reward - 2016
5) Championship ashe chibi icon (you can only get it when you buy something from the merch store) - 2018
Neo Pax Sivir is pretty cool - anything in that collection is awesome to own.

There should be a website where you can show of your collection and see other peoples. It should also be able to give you a rating on how rare your items are and what percentage of summoners own it. I think this would be really cool.
